abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Public Enterprise
            Sector Institutional Development and Technical Assistance
            Project are to provide the technical assistance support the
            Government needs to extend and deepen its public enterprise
            reform efforts.  The project will provide technical
            assistance to oversee parastatal reform, logistical support
            and resources needed to execute the reform's main
            elements.  The technical assistance to the Ministry of
            Finance consists of services and training to deal with the
            accounting and budgetary procedures and monitoring of
            financial performance of public enterprises.  The technical
            assistance for energy will assist with seismic data
            processing, data reinterpretation and reprocessing and
            petroleum exploration promotion, and implementation of the
            household energy strategy.  The technical assistance to the
            Ministry of Commerce is to help liberalize prices, set up a
            regulatory framework for private insurance companies and to
            demonopolize the Societe Nationale d'Import-Export
            (SONIMEX).  The technical assistance to the Office des
            Postes et Telecommunications (OPT) will update the
            rehabilitation plan, prepare a performance contract, and
            complete the introduction of a new computerized budgeting
            and accounting system.  The technical assistance to Air
            Mauritanie and Port Autonome de Nouakchott dit Port
            del'Amitie (PANPA) includes preparation of performance
            contracts.  The project also provides for training,
            equipment and other facilities.
